item.title: EP 787 - The Steven Spielberg Rape Caper
item.itunes:title: The Steven Spielberg Rape Caper
item.description:
Today we meet a sad giant in Russia, and then we investigate the insane true crime story of a man who wanted to rape Steven Spielberg!

https://www.datalounge.com/thread/18259702-i-wonder-where-jonathan-norman-is-now-steven-spielbergs-wanna-be-rapist

The PEOPLE, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. Jonathan NORMAN, Defendant and Appellant.

https://caselaw.findlaw.com/ca-court-of-appeal/1223771.html

Steven Spielberg stalker had plans to handcuff and RAPE Steven, arrested near mansion armed with knife, handcuffs,& duct tape

https://groups.google.com/g/alt.true-crime/c/QkT4Mpz6ok4?pli=1

Declared a Danger, Spielberg Stalker Gets Sentence of 25 Years to Life

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/spielberg-panicked-by-stalker-who-wanted-to-rape-him-1289662.html

Spielberg tells of gay stalker fear

https://www.independent.ie/world-news/spielberg-tells-of-gay-stalker-fear-26197637.html
